These type of events are marketing strategies to promote new champ/skins. You can get mission rewards for playing the new champion (which you need to buy first), In some of the events you can use your event tokens to get a special border for the newly released skin, which makes more people buy the new skin.

It's quite unlikely that riot will bring out another set of skins for diana and leone that purely empathise on the sun/moon conflict aspect.
